attributes.action: Use Dartmoor Prison in the short term to house illegal asylum seekers.
attributes.additional_details: The cost of millions per week at the tax payers expense.
attributes.background: Open Dartmoor prison to house asylum seekers in the short term while waiting to be processed instead of using hotels and houses of multiple occupancy.

rejection.details: You could start a different petition calling for parts of the prison estate across the UK that are currently not being used to be made available for this purpose.
